description: The Achillea 'Snow Sport' yarrow is an amazing plant species. It features beautiful silvery-gray foliage that is perfect to add texture to your garden. It produces delicate white flower clusters, making it a great filler for any outdoor space. This hardy perennial is tolerant of a variety of conditions, including drought, and is low maintenance, so it can be planted almost anywhere. It draws butterflies to the garden, and once established, it spreads, so it will help fill in any gaps. It's perfect for a cottage garden look that will be striking all season.
